SELECT a.id,a.price,a.market_price,a.product_id,a.product_name,a.unit,a.type,a.stock_id,a.inventorycount FROM ( ( SELECT t.id,t.price,t.market_price,t.product_id,t.product_name,t.unit,t.type,m.stock_id,IFNULL(m.inventorycount,0) as inventorycount FROM ( SELECT psi.id,psi.price,psi.market_price,psi.product_id,p.name as product_name,p.unit,1 as type FROM product_specification_info psi LEFT JOIN product p ON psi.product_id = p.id WHERE psi.del_flag = '0' AND p.del_flag = 0 AND p.sell_status = 1 AND p.is_specification = 1 AND p.type = 0 ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT psk.id as stock_id,psk.inventorycount,psk.specification_info_id,psk.product_id FROM product_specification_stock psk WHERE psk.type = 1 AND psk.company_id = #{companyId} ) m on t.id = m.specification_info_id ) UNION ( SELECT n.id,n.price,n.market_price,n.product_id,n.product_name,n.unit,n.type,p.stock_id,IFNULL(p.inventorycount,0) as inventorycount FROM ( SELECT 0 as id,p.price,p.market_price,p.id as product_id,p.name as product_name,p.unit,0 as type from product p where p.del_flag = 0 AND p.sell_status = 1 AND p.is_specification = 0 AND p.type = 0 ) n LEFT JOIN ( SELECT psk.id as stock_id,psk.inventorycount,psk.specification_info_id,psk.product_id FROM product_specification_stock psk WHERE psk.type = 0 AND psk.company_id = #{companyId} ) p on n.product_id = p.product_id ) ) a ORDER BY a.id,a.product_id
